meanings.definition: The quality or state of being mysterious.
meanings.sent1: The mysteriousness of the old house intrigued the children.
meanings.sent2: There was a sense of mysteriousness surrounding the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent3: The mysteriousness of the missing sock made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held a deep mysteriousness that captivated him.
meanings.sent5: The mysteriousness of the forest at night sent shivers down his spine.

meanings.definition: The feeling or impression of mystery.
meanings.sent1: The movie had a touch of mysteriousness that kept the audience guessing.
meanings.sent2: She gazed at the painting, trying to unravel its mysteriousness.
meanings.sent3: The mysteriousness of the locked box puzzled the detective.
meanings.sent4: The mysteriousness of the fog enveloped the town in an eerie silence.
meanings.sent5: His smile held a hint of mysteriousness that intrigued her.
